_sText:
[Thanks for the Video beldentZORD...](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=icWbimBSzoY "Video")

[This is my video...](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-8r8V2Svu-w "video")
Hi
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is final update to this version i have fix the bug in the map and i ad new stuff.

1. bug nr1 player somtime not teleporting to black box, they are still in the garage, so they cant be deactivate when someone win race. To fix this bug i will not teleport player to black box. They will stay in garage.
2. I ad func_wall_toggle and logic_case so the map will look diferent every new round.
3. Changed 4 lap to 3 lap to win.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is update to my old map [SuperMarioKart_v1...](http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/135920 "map"). My vehicles and player are made in hammer editor from brush to propper_model. I have made some texture to i use free program GIMP 2 and for sound i use program Cool Edit Pro 2.1

mg_mario_kart_v1 info

* 20 vehicles 5 diferent color
* 4 model player Mario/Luigi/Warior/Bowser
* 6 diferent voice and 1 mario kart Circuit music. 
* 2 game short and long race.
* Press enter on car to drive.
* Press UP/Down/Left/Right to drive.
* Press reload button for voice. 
* Press left mouse to shoot shell.
* When you tuch question marks you will get 3 shell to shoot on cars.
* You have 1 min to get out from garage.
* when someone finish the race everyone except him died.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

** please tel me if you finde bug, and what to fix **

1. bug i forget delet 1 terorist in ct spawn.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- When i have time i will try make new version mg_mario_kart_v2.
- If you realy want make a mario kart map, then here link to my prefabs. [prefab mario kart...](http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/5750 "prefabs")

Thanks and have fun =)
